title: How does management quota at PES work
content: Outside state student, 96 percentile in mains, general male ,  cooked, want cs, how to apply and what is cost

comments.body: Not entirely sure, but you might get CS or ECE in PES at 96 percentile. In their website the fees mentioned is 5 lacks/year

If im not wrong it's 64L for cse could be more.Also only that is not enough your late for management because people start applying for management from November-December 
Imo it is not worth 64L 
Lastly it's your choice

I think you need to visit the campus and find out, it's not an online process as far as I remember. 

Also, unwanted uncle opinion - this place is not worth the management quota fees.
\+1, it's not worth any fees for that matter. The teacher quality has become much worse compared to pre covid times. We are just paying for placements
I'd say it's worth it if you're from CET though. Pretty affordable and you get great placement opportunities.
u will get a seat through JEE main chill
You will get cse from jee mains itself in PES

Yeah one of my friend was getting ECE for 83%ile itself in main branch. You can definitely get CSE for 96%ile. But keep in mind that the fees is more if you go through mains, it's 5L per annum excluding hostel fees i believe.
